author: Shaun 21
message: it can be stopped once we oust corruption they can if they choose to the European union bounds their hands and even despite this italy greece and various other countries are now refusing and i dont blame them controlled immigration is what is desirable but our problem is pure unadulterated corruption his hands are bound friend wake up! no our border patrol agents and police take bribes we have problems with Nigerian cartels and all sorts due to this corruption and i have no doubt they are in with government as corruption drips down from the top the only solution is to stop and prosecute corruption at the highest levels and the fear of being corrupt will drip down from the top No we can properly enforce our borders and then check peoples credentials when they enter our country agreed thats our goal as people rather then focusing on the symtoms which the government loves we should focus on the source of the problem which is government our government love pointing fingers and detouring discontent during the struggle zuma ran a detention camp for unruly members of the struggle where some questionable things happened to say the least anyone of us caught doing such a thing would be in prison
